DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , international , multi-center , randomize control trial compare preservation donor lung use OCS-Lung perfusion device ( Treatment Group ) cold flush storage ( Control Group ) .
DOC.brief_title: International Randomized Study TransMedics Organ Care System ( OCS Lung ) Lung Preservation Transplantation
DOC.criteria: Registered primary doublelung transplant candidate Age > equal 18 Signed : 1 ) write informed consent document 2 ) authorization use disclose protected health information Prior solid organ bone marrow transplant Single lung recipient Multiple organ transplant recipient Chronic use hemodialysis diagnosis chronic renal insufficiency
